title: Confirming Your PBE Account
body: I haven't played on the PBE for a while now; I just updated the client. I try to login, but the password I remember (my memory is terrible by the way) isn't working. I don't know if it's my horrible memory or the expiration of my PBE account. I was accepted in the middle of last year, IIRC. Sent an email to the support team, still haven't gotten back to me.

replies.body: It does look like you have an active PBE account, so you should be able to use [normal recovery methods ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) to regain access.  If you have any trouble, we'd be happy to help out individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our account team can help!

I've tried recovering it by using my Username and my email address. I haven't gotten an email {{champion:32}}
The support team haven't replied either{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
